content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Smelting Line at (x=1-3, y=1-3.5)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at (1,1) and (3,1)
- Two burner inserters at (1.5,2.5) and (3.5,2.5)
- Two wooden chests at (1.5,3.5) and (3.5,3.5) containing iron plates
- Additional wooden chest at (5.5,3.5) with burner inserter at (5.5,2.5)

### Copper Smelting Line at (x=2-4, y=7-9.5)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at (2,7) and (4,7)
- Two burner inserters at (2.5,8.5) and (4.5,8.5)
- Two wooden chests at (2.5,9.5) and (4.5,9.5)
- Additional burner inserter at (3.5,9.5) connecting chests

### Copper Cable Production Line at (x=14.5, y=11.5-14.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine 1 at (14.5,14.5)
- Input chest at (14.5,11.5)
- Burner inserter at (14.5,12.5)
- Output chest at (11.5,14.5) containing copper cables
- Burner inserter at (12.5,14.5)

### Electronic Circuit Production Line at (x=21.5, y=11.5-15.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine 1 at (21.5,15.5)
- Input chests at (21.5,11.5) and (21.5,12.5)
- Burner inserter at (21.5,13.5)

### Power Generation System at (x=2.5-13.5, y=35.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (2.5,35.5)
- Boiler at (7,35.5)
- Steam engine at (13.5,35.5)
- Connected pipe network for water flow
- Electric pole network extending from (4.5,10.5) to (13.5,33.5)

### Transport System
Multiple belt groups connecting various production lines:
- Belt group from (2.5,8.5) to (4.5,8.5)
- Belt group from (4.5,9.5) to (6.5,9.5)
- Belt group from (3.5,9.5) to (11.5,12.5)
- Belt group from (2.5,9.5) to (-1.5,16.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Errors with crafting transport belts
- Cannot directly craft transport belts without proper infrastructure
- Ensure required ingredients (iron plates) are produced in furnaces first
- Set up proper production chain for sub-components before attempting to craft final products

### Errors with resource management
- Ensure sufficient coal is available before attempting to insert into furnaces
- Keep track of fuel levels in burner devices
- Maintain adequate supply of raw materials for continuous production

### Power system issues
- Machines showing "not receiving electricity" warnings - ensure proper connection of power poles
- Boiler showing "out of fuel" warning - maintain constant fuel supply
- Steam engine showing "no input liquid" - ensure proper pipe connections and fluid flow
